item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello there! I’m a Software Engineer and Writer. In my free time, I like to experiment with cooking, ponder life’s many mysteries, and hang out with my Rabbits. See Also Dotbun - A fun test of AWS serverless, CDNs, and modern web standards. üê∞

item.title: Syntax Higlighters
item.description: Python def sum(a,b): return a+b print(f'The Sum of 4 and 5 is {sum(4,5)}') JavaScript const sum = (a,b)=>{ return a+b } console.log(sum(4,5)) Go package main import ( "fmt" ) func addition(a int, b int) int { return a + b } func main() { x := addition(4, 5) fmt.Println(x) } Subject {{subject}} Hosted On {{hosted_on}} Site {{site_url}} Incident Time {{time_of_incident}} Incident Ref Number {{name}} Resolved By {{resolved_by}} Resolution Time {{resolution_time}}
